category.name: Active Workspace.Massive Model Visualization
category.category_description: Active Workspace Massive Model Visualization preferences

preference.name: MMV_delta_collection_accumulation_limit
preference.preference_description: Controls the maximum number of accumulated Massive Model Product (MMP) structure delta files in a Awv0MMPDeltaCollection dataset. When the limit is reached, older delta files are deleted from the dataset.
